channel.title: Advanced-features on Martian
channel.description: Recent content in Advanced-features on Martian

item.title: Advanced Features
item.description: Martian supports a number of advanced features to provide: Performance and resource efficiency that scales from single servers to large high-performance compute clusters Early error detection Data storage efficiency Loosely-coupled integration with other systems Parallelization Subject to resource constraints, Martian parallelizes work by breaking pipeline logic into chunks and parallelizing them in two ways. First, stages can run in parallel if they don’t depend on each other’s outputs.
